20 particle_filter::particle_filter(int nParticles, int nDimensions,
21  uint statesPerRobot)
22  : nParticles_(nParticles), nDimensions_(nDimensions),
23  statesPerRobot_(statesPerRobot),
24  particles_(nDimensions, subparticles_t(nParticles)), seed_(time(0)), initialized_(false)
25 {
26  int size[2];
27  size[0] = (int)particles_.size();
28  size[1] = (int)particles_[0].size();
29 
30  ROS_INFO("Created particle filter with dimensions %d, %d", size[0], size[1]);
31 }
32 
33 //TODO set different values for position and orientation, targets, etc
34 // Simple version, use default values - randomize all values between [-10,10]
35 void particle_filter::init()
36 {
37  if(initialized_)
38  return ;
39 
40  int lvalue=-10;
41  int rvalue=10;
42 
43  std::vector<double> def( (nDimensions_-1)*2 );
44 
45  for(int i = 0; i < def.size(); i+=2)
46  {
47  def[i] = lvalue;
48  def[i+1] = rvalue;
49  }
50 
51  // Call the custom function with these values
52  init(def);
53 }
54 
55 // Overloaded fucntion when using custom values
56 void particle_filter::init(const std::vector<double> custom)
57 {
58  if(initialized_)
59  return ;
60 
61  ROS_INFO("Initializing particle filter");
62 
63  // For all subparticle sets except the particle weights
64  for (int i = 0; i < custom.size()/2; ++i)
65  {
66  ROS_DEBUG("Values for distribution: %.4f %.4f", custom[2*i], custom[2*i+1]);
67 
68  boost::random::uniform_real_distribution<> dist(custom[2 * i],
69  custom[2 * i + 1]);
70 
71  // Sample a value from the uniform distribution for each particle
72  BOOST_FOREACH (pdata_t& val, particles_[i])
73  {
74  val = dist(seed_);
75  }
76  }
77 
78  // Particle weights init with same weight (1/nParticles)
79  particles_[nDimensions_ - 1].assign(nParticles_, 1 / nParticles_);
80 
81  // Set flag
82  initialized_ = true;
83 
84  ROS_INFO("Particle filter initialized");
85 }
86 
87 void particle_filter::predict(uint robotNumber,
88  const Eigen::Isometry2d& odometry)
89 {
90  if(!initialized_)
91  return;
92 
93  Eigen::Isometry2d prevParticle, curParticle;
94 
95  //use non-0-index logic (copied value)
96  robotNumber--;
97 
98  for (uint i = 0; i < nParticles_; i++)
99  {
100  prevParticle = Eigen::Rotation2Dd(particles_[2 + robotNumber*3][i])
101  .toRotationMatrix();
102  prevParticle.translation() =
103  Eigen::Vector2d(particles_[0 + (robotNumber - 1) * 3][i],
104  particles_[1 + (robotNumber - 1) * 3][i]);
105  curParticle = prevParticle * odometry;
106  particles_[0 + (robotNumber - 1) * 3][i] = curParticle.translation()[0];
107  particles_[1 + (robotNumber - 1) * 3][i] = curParticle.translation()[1];
108  Eigen::Matrix<double, 2, 2> r_particle = curParticle.linear();
109  double angle_particle = acos(r_particle(0, 0));
110  particles_[2 + (robotNumber - 1) * 3][i] = angle_particle;
111  }
112 }
113
